name: insomnia-plugin-swagger-path-parameters
author: Davi Rodrigues <developer.davi@gmail.com>, Gregory Schier <greg.schier@konghq.com>
description: Insomnia plugin to enable URL path parameters in Query tab

insomnia.name: swagger-path-parameters
insomnia.description: Define path parameters in Query tab like Swagger (using single curly brackets e.g.: {foo}, {foobar})
